data.comment: The match has started at Estadio Castelao.
Free kick Goias.
In the minute 3, Goias are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Goias close to the penalty box.
In the minute 7, Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards Goias a goal kick.
Can Goias get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fortaleza's half?
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 9, Fortaleza's Wellington Paulista gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Castelao. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Fortaleza in their own half.
Goal kick for Goias at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 14, Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Goias in the half of Fortaleza.
In Fortaleza, Fernandao (Goias) misses the target with a header.
Fortaleza have a goal kick.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Goias at Estadio Castelao.
Attention is being given to Goiasâ€™s Fernandao and play has been suspended briefly.
Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
In the minute 21, Fernandao has recovered and rejoins the match in Fortaleza.
Goias awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a Goias throw-in in Fortaleza's half.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Goias in the half of Fortaleza.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards the home team a throw-in.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 23, Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fernandao puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Great play from Miguel Figueira to set up the goal.
In the minute 26, Throw-in Goias.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Fortaleza.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Goias in the half of Fortaleza.
Ball safe as Goias is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
Breno is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 36, Goias to take a throw-in in Fortaleza territory.
Breno for Goias is back on the field again.
Ariel Cabral (Goias) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 39, Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fortaleza's Jackson has been booked in Fortaleza.
Fortaleza awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 42, David for Fortaleza drives towards goal at Estadio Castelao. But the finish is unsuccessful.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Miguel Figueira.
Goias's Miguel Figueira looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 44, Miguel Figueira of Goias gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fortaleza.
Fortaleza's Romarinho breaks free at Estadio Castelao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Goias at Estadio Castelao.
5 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Fortaleza.
Throw-in for Goias in their own half.
In the minute 45, Fortaleza are pushing forward but David's finish is wide of the goal.
Goias have a goal kick.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 45, Free kick Fortaleza.
The first half has been concluded at Estadio Castelao.
The second-half is now underway.
Ball safe as Goias is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 46, Marcelo Chamusca (Fortaleza) is making a first substitution, with Yuri Cesar replacing Osvaldo.
In the minute 47, Fortaleza drive upfield and Juninho gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Goias defender.
Goias needs to be cautious. Fortaleza have an attacking throw-in.
Fortaleza's Romarinho gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Goias defender.
In the minute 47, Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards Goias a goal kick.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Goias's half.
Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Goias territory.
In the minute 50, Fortaleza push upfield but Felipe Fernandes de Lima quickly pulls them for offside.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Fortaleza Fortaleza drive forward through David. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 52, Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
Throw-in for Fortaleza in the half of Goias.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
In the minute 53, Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fortaleza's Wellington Paulista attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Juninho gets his shot on target but fails to score for Fortaleza.
The match at Estadio Castelao has been interrupted briefly for a check on Keko, who is down injured.
In the minute 57, Augusto Cesar (Goias) has taken off Keko who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Henrique Lordelo is the replacement.
Fortaleza push forward at Estadio Castelao and Romarinho gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Goias defence.
Fortaleza's Bruno Melo is whistled for offside at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 61, Wellington Paulista scores with his head for Fortaleza to level the match at 1-1.
Bruno Melo with an assist there.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
In the minute 65, Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Goias.
The away team have replaced Miguel Figueira with Pedro Marinho. This is the second substitution made today by Augusto Cesar.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fortaleza.
In the minute 67, Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
Free kick for Fortaleza in the half of Goias.
Wellington Paulista (Fortaleza) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 69, Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Fortaleza Fortaleza's Wellington Paulista is caught offside.
In the minute 72, Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Fortaleza.
Free kick Goias.
Bergson is on a sub for Wellington Paulista for Fortaleza.
In the minute 75, Important block from the Fortaleza defence as Fernandao fires in a strike for Goias.
Fernandao is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Joao Marcos (Goias) has replaced the possibly injured Fernandao.
In the minute 78, Daniel is replacing Ariel Cabral for Goias at Estadio Castelao.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Fortaleza push forward at Estadio Castelao and Bergson gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Goias defence.
In the minute 80, Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
Can Fortaleza get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
Marcelo Chamusca is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Castelao with Carlinhos replacing Bruno Melo.
In the minute 81, Joao Paulo is replacing Romarinho for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards Goias a goal kick.
In Fortaleza Fortaleza drive forward through Yuri Cesar. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 83, Free kick in a good position for Goias!
Felipe Fernandes de Lima waits before resuming play because Tadeu for Goias is still down.
Tadeu returns to the field for Goias after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 86, Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
Joao Paulo for Fortaleza has been booked by Felipe Fernandes de Lima and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 87, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Tadeu for Goias who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Goiasâ€™s Tadeu is on his feet again at Estadio Castelao.
Fortaleza have a goal kick.
In the minute 89, Throw-in high up the field for Fortaleza in Fortaleza.
Felipe (Fortaleza) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
7 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in Goias.
Joao Paulo (Fortaleza) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Fortaleza close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Fortaleza in the half of Goias.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Goias at Estadio Castelao.
Throw-in for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
The home team have replaced David with Ederson. This is the fifth substitution made today by Marcelo Chamusca.
